{"step_by_step_thinking": "Document [2] and [16] provide information about the efficacy of Prasinezumab in treating Parkinson's disease. According to these documents, Prasinezumab therapy had no meaningful effect on global or imaging measures of Parkinson's disease progression as compared with placebo and was associated with infusion reactions. Therefore, it can be concluded that Prasinezumab is not effective for Parkinson's Disease.", "answer_choice": "B"}
